it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the highest level class in Controller package. When a new lobby is born, a new Controller is created.

    ontech7

      • activateToolcard

        public boolean activateToolcard(java.lang.String username,
                                int toolCardId)
        Activate one of the 3 toolcards. Checks if the username coincide with the first player's name of the queue Checks if it's possible to use the toolcard and if the player has enough tokens. Increase the cost of the toolcard if activated.
        Parameters:
        username - of the player
        toolCardId - index of toolcard selected
        Returns:
        true if successfully activated
